Description.Text: Rome Times Hotel Annex is a stylish 4-star property offering contemporary accommodation in the heart of Rome. It boasts an excellent location between Trevi Fountain and the iconic Colosseum and is close to Repubblica Teatro dell'Opera metro station. The area surrounding the impressive Trevi Fountain features narrow cobblestone streets and a high concentration of hotels, cafes and restaurants. Nearby places of interest include the Pantheon, the elegant Spanish Steps, the prestigious Via Veneto, the Roman Forum and Quirinal Hill. Repubblica Teatro dell'Opera metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Rome destinations. The hotel is housed in a mid-rise building with shuttered windows. Guest can access the gym and rooftop terrace of the neighbouring Rome Times Hotel. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 18sqm and decorated in a contemporary style with grey and earth tones. They feature a sitting area with a sofa. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV with pay-per-view channels, air-conditioning, mini-bar, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can access the cafe and bar of the neighbouring Rome Times Hotel. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
